title: St. Ives Rosewater And Bamboo Stick Facial Cleanser 1.59 oz (Pack of 1)
features: Say so long to shine with the St. Ives Rose Water and Bamboo Face Cleansing Stick!
Feel the love with extracts from rose water and bamboo known to combat oil buildup without stripping your skin.
St. Ives Face Cleansing Sticks are 100% hygienic
100% natural coconut oil gently cleanses the skin while it nourishes
ravel-friendly and spill-proof so your face Cleansing Stick can go with you wherever your day takes you. Paraben free, dermatologist tested, sulfate-free and non-comedogenic (won?t clog pores!)
description: Washing your face has never been this fun! St. Ives Cleansing Sticks offer a highly sensorial and fun cleansing experience. They provide a gentle massage for your skin in a way traditional cleansers don?t and the fragrances awaken your senses. Plus, this Korean beauty product is great to use daily, morning and night! Say so long to shine with the St. Ives Rose Water and Bamboo Face Cleansing Stick. Feel the love with extracts from rose water and bamboo known to combat oil buildup without stripping your skin. St. Ives Cleansing Sticks are 100% hygienic and made with 100% natural coconut oil that gently cleanses the skin by emulsifying dirt, oil and makeup while it nourishes with lipids necessary for a healthy looking skin barrier. St. Ives Cleansing Sticks offer a highly sensorial and fun cleansing experience. They leave your skin softer and refreshed so you can glow and go. Not to mention, the convenient stick format is travel-friendly, spill-proof and can go with you wherever your day takes you: the gym, the plane, vacation, work, class, and more. Our Cleansing Sticks are paraben free, dermatologist tested, sulfate-free and non-comedogenic so they won?t clog your pores. Your cleansing stick can also act as a makeup remover of oil-based make up products, score! Warning: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. How to use: Wet face. Twist up stick and rub over skin. Massage gently with fingertips to lather. Rinse & glow! We recommend using your stick by the sink. We recommend using St. Ives Cleansing Sticks twice daily.
